marklogic.body: You need to take a good look at the world around you. None of us were born yesterday pal, this isn't something that happened overnight - no, the black community has had an Ax to grind for a long time and now, because of their saviour Obama, many - if not most, feel the time is right to shove their demands on white America, and if we object in any way, we are the racists - when in fact, its the black man who holds a hatrded and rage in his heart - the fires were kept Burning through the likes of numerous outspoken individuals such as Farrakhan for instance. Like I said, clean up your own world before you force yourselves on others...if thats racist, so be it.....Z
